option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Use official Python image FROM python:3.12-slim
# Set working directory WORKDIR /app
# Install system dependencies RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
# Copy requirements and install COPY requirements.txt . RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
# Copy app code COPY . .
# Expose port EXPOSE 8000
# Start FastAPI app with Uvicorn CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
